sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Jailed Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny has been sentenced to an additional 19 years in prison for extremism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: At least 11 dead and some 25 people still missing following the devastating landslide in Georgia's Chauvy Valley.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's Secret Service says it struck a Russian Navy ship in the Black Sea,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: marking the first strike on a commercial Russian port since the start of the war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Protests in Beirut mark three years since one of history's biggest non-nuclear explosions

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: rocked the city, killing more than 200 people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Jailed Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny has been convicted of extremism and handed a 19-year sentence, his third and longest prison term.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This latest trial relates to the activities of his anti-corruption foundation and statements by his top associates.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But all the charges against him are widely seen as a deliberate strategy by the Kremlin to silence its most ardent critic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The 47-year-old is already serving sentences totalling 11 and a half years on fraud and other charges.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A gigantic layer of mud covering what used to be the bed of a river, surrounded by farms, houses, roads and bridges.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: At least 11 people died and some 25 others are still missing after a landslide devastated the popular resort in Georgia's Chauve Valley.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Irakli Garibashvili has visited the site, personally supervising the work of rescuers who are being helped by the army.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: As search and rescue operations continue, more than 200 people have been evacuated from the area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Officials say the landslide was likely triggered by recent heavy rainfall, aggravated by erosion and the melting of two nearby glaciers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Security Service of Ukraine has released video of what it claims is a sea drone striking a Russian Navy ship in the Black Sea port of Novorossiysk. Kyiv says the drone carried 450 kilos of explosives and claims the amphibious ship with 100 crew members on board was damaged in the attack. On social media channels, unverified footage appeared to show the listing vessel being towed by a tug.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Russia's defense ministry acknowledges the port was attacked with drones, but says they were all intercepted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The port is a key hub for Russian exports, and hosts a naval base, shipping yards, and an oil terminal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The strike marks the first time a commercial Russian port has been targeted since the start of the full-scale invasion last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: If confirmed, the attack would be similar in scale to the one that sank Russia's guided missile

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: cruiser Moskva in April 2022.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Protests in Beirut on Friday mark three years since one of history's biggest non-nuclear explosions rocked the Lebanese capital, killing more than 220 people and injuring more than 6,000.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Demonstrators are demanding answers, as no one has yet been held accountable for the blast.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Triggered by a fire in a warehouse where a vast stockpile of chemical fertilizer had been stored for years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: French President Emmanuel Macron, who visited Beirut after the explosion, wrote on Twitter that the city's inhabitants can count on France's solidarity and friendship.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: On Thursday, 300 individuals and organizations called on the United Nations to establish a fact-finding investigation into the blast, as a domestic probe has come to a standstill.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The blast struck amid Lebanon's economic crisis that the World Bank has dubbed one of the worst in recent history, pulverizing its currency and wiping out people's savings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Romanian authorities say British-American influencer Andrew Tate has won an appeal to be released from house arrest,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: pending his trial for rape and human trafficking.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Tate, his brother Tristan and two Romanian women were arrested near Bucharest in December.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: All four defendants have been placed under judicial supervision.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: On Friday, Tate once again proclaimed their innocence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Andrew Tate was previously banned from a number of social media platforms for expressing hate speech and misogynistic comments.
